#include <gdk/gdk.h>
struct GdkPixmap; GdkPixmap* gdk_pixmap_new (GdkDrawable *drawable, gint width, gint height, gint depth); GdkBitmap* gdk_bitmap_create_from_data (GdkDrawable *drawable, const gchar *data, gint width, gint height); GdkPixmap* gdk_pixmap_create_from_data (GdkDrawable *drawable, const gchar *data, gint width, gint height, gint depth, const GdkColor *fg, const GdkColor *bg); GdkPixmap* gdk_pixmap_create_from_xpm (GdkDrawable *drawable, GdkBitmap **mask, const GdkColor *transparent_color, const gchar *filename); GdkPixmap* gdk_pixmap_colormap_create_from_xpm (GdkDrawable *drawable, GdkColormap *colormap, GdkBitmap **mask, const GdkColor *transparent_color, const gchar *filename); GdkPixmap* gdk_pixmap_create_from_xpm_d (GdkDrawable *drawable, GdkBitmap **mask, const GdkColor *transparent_color, gchar **data); GdkPixmap* gdk_pixmap_colormap_create_from_xpm_d (GdkDrawable *drawable, GdkColormap *colormap, GdkBitmap **mask, const GdkColor *transparent_color, gchar **data); #define gdk_pixmap_ref #define gdk_pixmap_unref struct GdkBitmap; #define gdk_bitmap_ref #define gdk_bitmap_unref

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Pixmaps are offscreen drawables. They can be drawn upon with the standard drawing primitives, then copied to another drawable (such as a GdkWindow) with gdk_pixmap_draw(). The depth of a pixmap is the number of bits per pixels. Bitmaps are simply pixmaps with a depth of 1. (That is, they are monochrome bitmaps - each pixel can be either on or off).

refsect2.title: struct GdkPixmap
refsect2.para: An opaque structure representing an offscreen drawable. Pointers to structures of type GdkPixmap, GdkBitmap, and GdkWindow, can often be used interchangeably. The type GdkDrawable refers generically to any of these types.

refsect2.title: gdk_pixmap_new ()
refsect2.programlisting: GdkPixmap* gdk_pixmap_new (GdkDrawable *drawable, gint width, gint height, gint depth);
refsect2.para: Create a new pixmap with a given size and depth.

listitem.simpara: A GdkDrawable, used to determine default values for the new pixmap. Can be NULL if depth is specified,
The width of the new pixmap in pixels.
The height of the new pixmap in pixels.
The depth (number of bits per pixel) of the new pixmap. If -1, and drawable is not NULL, the depth of the new pixmap will be equal to that of drawable.
the GdkPixmap

refsect2.title: gdk_bitmap_create_from_data ()
refsect2.programlisting: GdkBitmap* gdk_bitmap_create_from_data (GdkDrawable *drawable, const gchar *data, gint width, gint height);
refsect2.para: Creates a new bitmap from data in XBM format.

listitem.simpara: a GdkDrawable, used to determine default values for the new pixmap. Can be NULL, in which case the root window is used.
a pointer to the XBM data.
the width of the new pixmap in pixels.
the height of the new pixmap in pixels.
the GdkBitmap

refsect2.title: gdk_pixmap_create_from_data ()
refsect2.programlisting: GdkPixmap* gdk_pixmap_create_from_data (GdkDrawable *drawable, const gchar *data, gint width, gint height, gint depth, const GdkColor *fg, const GdkColor *bg);
refsect2.para: Create a two-color pixmap from data in XBM data.

listitem.simpara: a GdkDrawable, used to determine default values for the new pixmap. Can be NULL, if the depth is given.
a pointer to the data.
the width of the new pixmap in pixels.
the height of the new pixmap in pixels.
the depth (number of bits per pixel) of the new pixmap.
the foreground color.
the background color.
the GdkPixmap

refsect2.title: gdk_pixmap_create_from_xpm ()
refsect2.programlisting: GdkPixmap* gdk_pixmap_create_from_xpm (GdkDrawable *drawable, GdkBitmap **mask, const GdkColor *transparent_color, const gchar *filename);
refsect2.para: Create a pixmap from a XPM file.

listitem.simpara: a GdkDrawable, used to determine default values for the new pixmap.
a pointer to a place to store a bitmap representing the transparency mask of the XPM file. Can be NULL, in which case transparency will be ignored.
the color to be used for the pixels that are transparent in the input file. Can be NULL, in which case a default color will be used.
the filename of a file containing XPM data.
the GdkPixmap

refsect2.title: gdk_pixmap_colormap_create_from_xpm ()
refsect2.programlisting: GdkPixmap* gdk_pixmap_colormap_create_from_xpm (GdkDrawable *drawable, GdkColormap *colormap, GdkBitmap **mask, const GdkColor *transparent_color, const gchar *filename);
refsect2.para: Create a pixmap from a XPM file using a particular colormap.

listitem.simpara: a GdkDrawable, used to determine default values for the new pixmap. Can be NULL if colormap is given.
the GdkColormap that the new pixmap will be use. If omitted, the colormap for window will be used.
a pointer to a place to store a bitmap representing the transparency mask of the XPM file. Can be NULL, in which case transparency will be ignored.
the color to be used for the pixels that are transparent in the input file. Can be NULL, in which case a default color will be used.
the filename of a file containing XPM data.
the GdkPixmap.
